rules_text:
[i]Veteran's Aid[/i] – If one or more counters would be put on a permanent, that many plus one counters are put on that permanent instead.
[i]Dual Strike+[/i] – Whenever a [i]Pair Up[/i] ability you control triggers, support 2. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)[/i]
